title: LFM DIA+ RANKED TEAM
body:
Hey, as the tile says I'm creating a ranked team aiming for diamond-master tier.
U should :
* Be atleast 17y/o
*Be Diamond+
*Be serious gamer and no flamer 
*Have fun @ playing

Just post the information of you under this thread i ll add u if im interested!

replies.body:
What's about the current roster of your team?
Any1 in there already?
What's need? (positions).
